alert.note: Alert for Chaves; De Baca; Lincoln (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued February 26 at 3:07PM MST until February 26 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Southeastern Lincoln County in central New Mexico... South central De Baca County in east central New Mexico... Western Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico... * Until 345 PM MST. * At 306 PM MST, a dust storm stretched from the Dunken area northeast through Roswell and Mesa. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Satellite imagery. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... Highway 285 between Mile Markers 79 and 153. Highway 380 between Mile Markers 156 and 160. Locations impacted include... Roswell, Mesa, Elk, Dunken, Sunset, Roswell Correctional Facility and Midway. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
